class_notes: ENVS 347L is a co-requisite with ENVS 347; students must enroll in both the lecture and lab section
course_description: This lab/field experience is a supplement to ENVS 347 Landscapes and Geomorphology which examines cultural and physical landscapes and their temporal and spatial changes through the study of natural and built environments and by incorporating the use of geospatial technologies.
schedule_location: Th 1pm-3:45pm in Math & Science Center - W502
sections: Class Nbr: 2676, Section #: 1, Type: LAB, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 1-3:45p, Instructor: M. Page, Status: Open
